Wisdom: اصْبِرْ عَلَى مَرَارَةِ [مَضَضِ‏] الْحَقِّ وَإِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَنْخَدِعَ لِحَلَاوَةِ الْبَاطِلِ
enWisdom: Be patient with the bitterness of truth and beware of being deceived by the sweetness of falsehood

Wisdom: لَا يَصْبِرُ عَلَى الْحَقِّ إِلَّا الْحَازِمُ الْأَرِيبُ
enWisdom: None is patient in the face of truth except the judicious and intelligent one

Wisdom: لَا يَصْبِرُ لِلْحَقِّ إِلَّا مَنْ يَعْرِفُ فَضْلَهُ
enWisdom: None is patient with the truth except the one who knows its merit

Wisdom: عَوْدُكَ إِلَى الْحَقِّ وَإِنْ تَعِبْتَ خَيْرٌ مِنْ رَاحَتِكَ مَعَ لُزُومِ الْبَاطِلِ
enWisdom: Your returning to the truth, even if you get exhausted, is better than your comfort while clinging to falsehood
